summary: This script fetches documentation for various web browsers (lynx, links, w3m, elinks, and links2) using the 'man' command. It then removes backslashes (\), pipes the output to a column formatter (col -b), and saves each document in separate files within the "docs" directory.

details.comment: This script fetches documentation for various web browsers (lynx, links, w3m, elinks, and links2) using the 'man' command. It then removes backslashes (\), pipes the output to a column formatter (col -b), and saves each document in separate files within the "docs" directory.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
man lynx | col -b | cat > docs/lynx.log
man links | col -b | cat > docs/links.log
man w3m | col -b | cat > docs/w3m.log
man elinks | col -b | cat > docs/elinks.log
man links2 | col -b | cat > docs/links2.log
